meanings.definition: Resembling an isthmus in shape or form.

meanings.sent3: The isthmoid shape of the river bend made it look like a tiny waist.
meanings.sent4: The isthmoid bridge linked the two islands like a slender thread.
meanings.sent5: The isthmoid landmass jutted out into the sea like a pointed finger.
